body.p:
To activate these:
The map must be a DITA bookmap.
There must be a figurelist or tablelist in the frontmatter or backmatter. In the following example, both of the lists are added just after the table of contents (the toc element is the placeholder where the table of contents will be created): <frontmatter> <booklists> <toc/> <figurelist/> <tablelist/> </booklists> </frontmatter>
